short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily convert the current page or any URL into a QR code, and you can also shorten the URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert your current webpage URL or any URL into a QR code. When dealing with lengthy URLs that may be difficult to scan, you can shorten them first and then generate a QR code for better scanning experience.

Key Features:
- Convert current page URL to QR code instantly
- Generate QR code for any custom URL 
- Shorten long URLs for better QR code readability
- Built-in security check for malicious URLs when shortening
- Save Shorten URL history for quick access
- Export QR codes as PNG images
